n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
i = 1
while i <= n - i + 1:
    if i % 2:
        a[i - 1], a[-i] = a[-i], a[i - 1]
    i += 1
print(*a)

n = int(input())
a = [0 for i in range(n)]
b = [0 for i in range(n)]
inp = input().split()
for i in range(n):
    a[i] = int(inp[i])

for i in range(0, (n + 1) // 2):
    if i % 2:
        b[i] = a[i]
        b[n - i - 1] = a[n - i - 1]
    else:
        b[i] = a[n - i - 1]
        b[n - i - 1] = a[i]
    #print(b)

print(" ".join(str(i) for i in b))

n = int(input())
l = list(map(int, input().split()))
for i in range(0, n // 2, 2):
    l[i], l[n - i - 1] = l[n - i - 1], l[i]
print(*l)

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

for i in range(n//2):
    if i % 2 == 0:
        t = a[i]
        a[i] = a[n-i-1]
        a[n-i-1] = t

print(*a)

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int,input().split()))

for i in range(n//2):

        a[i],a[n-i-1] = a[n-i-1],a[i]
for i in a:

print('')

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
for i in range(0, n // 2, 2):
    a[i], a[-i - 1] = a[-i - 1], a[i]
print(*a)

n = int(input())
a = [int(el) for el in input().split()]

for i in range(0, n // 2, 2):
	a[i], a[n - i - 1] = a[n - i - 1], a[i]
	
print(' '.join([str(el) for el in a]))
